metadata.job_to_be_done: Tell the main points of Agile methodology

extracted_sections.job_to_be_done: Plan a trip of 4 days for a group of 10 college friends to South of France, focusing on cities, attractions, and logistics

extracted_sections.section_title: 3. Overview of the Foundation Level Extension – Agile TesterSyllabus
3. Overview of the Foundation Level Extension – Agile TesterSyllabus

subsection_analysis.refined_text: The tester should be proficient in utilizing Agile methodologies and tools to deliver high-quality software within a collaborative, iterative environment.
The tester should be proficient in utilizing Agile methodologies and tools to deliver effective testing within a collaborative, iterative environment.
The tester should be able to effectively contribute to Agile projects by understanding and applying various testing methodologies and tools.
The tester should be proficient in utilizing Agile methodologies and tools to deliver effective testing within a collaborative, iterative environment.
The tester should be proficient in utilizing Agile methodologies, including test-driven development, acceptance testing, and continuous integration, to ensure product quality within an

2.5 Structure and Course Duration 
The Foundation Level Extension – Agile Tester syllabus has no shared or common elements with the
Foundation Level syllabus.
The syllabi must be taught in the following minimum number of days:
Syllabus Days
Baseline: Foundation 3
Extension: Agile Tester 2
The following figure shows the structure of the Agile Tester Extension and its relationship to the
Foundation Level.
